name: dicklaurent
text: That must be the fiver he got from Ray's mother to get himself a sandwich. Oh these details

name: prius_chaser
text: Wow. Ultra-detail good call.

name: bookofsand
text: Hell yeah, that's getting into The Annotated Achewood.

name: bixschmix
text:
I now know that I have been reading too much Achewood lately, because my heart went "pitter-patter" when you mentioned the Annotated Achewood, and then I got a little sad when I realized that it wasn't a real thing.

However, on the bright side, the GOF is going to be released as a graphic novel. I suppose I shouldn't quibble.

name: theguitarhero
text: 1 year later, the Annotated Achewood is coming soon. Except it won't have the GOF arc in it.

name: jaminspoon
text: It is a bittersweet symphony, this life.

name: straw
text: He is not keeping that cheese on as weight

name: nabeel84
text: And that's also not the only son of Ramses. That random cat came and went fast. Dornheim, where you go?

name: ojnabieoot
text: It's pretty reasonable to assume that Beef didn't know about Dornheim.  I haven't gotten to that part of the archives yet, but I don't think even Ray knew about him.

name: nabeel84
text: I know, I just thought it was interesting to point out. Maybe Dornheim got the fightin' gene too.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
Maybe Dornheim: rad band name.

also, maybe Donnie got the leaving gene and Ray got the fighting one.

name: phthoggos
text: This is the first and last time Beef has ever told anybody to "keep the change"

name: ferdinand
text: the "keep the change" was necessary for the image beef is trying to cultivate.  he and ray are the badass motherfuckers you don't cross, but to the people on their side, they're better than gold.  beef's already playing the game.

name: idiot_circus
text: they good people

name: poodlelucy
text: i am uber impressed with your recall for details. chubbied.

name: bozendoka
text: Whoo! Chubby #200 and well deserved.

name: kingofshell
text: Such great recall well-deserves 300 chubbies.

name: zem
text: A comment left by zem was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by _cheesekayke, scraggg, retinarow, brianstanwyck)

name: patkun
text: His Dad has the same ray-bans as him. Were they even invented in the seventies?

name: aperson
text: Only in a cat size.

name: electricjelly
text:
it was once mentioned that those are Versace glasses, see
this strip

name: tekende
text: A man as badass as Ramses Luther Smuckles need not be concerned about the limitations of such as time.

name: redphillip
text: Ray-Ban Wayfarers were ultra-cool from 1953 when they were introduced through to the early '70's.  They were sported by actors, beats, musicians, ultimately nigh on everybody.  They fell out of fashion for about a decade, and were revived in the '80's.

name: cicadalek
text: Note that the fact that Doyle Headely got run over was of no great importance to the Fight crew up til now, 'cos that's just the way they roll

name: deusoma
text: I'm sure the tower sees it as a "pre-Fight disqualification." It just means the Champion will only have to kick 2998 asses this year.

name: count_clock
text: Panels seven and eight are quite cinematic if you think about it.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I was going to comment THIS STRIP IS SO CINEMATIC

name: ctrl-s
text: Five is not a high enough rating for this strip.  On a scale of five, this gets, like, 20.

name: spinynorman
text: It is typical to take a BoC seriously when he is packed into a tiny sidecar two feet off the ground and wearing a small black helmet.

name: cailetshadow
text: This might be my favorite strip ever. I literally squint when I read it, I think because if I didn't the Awesomeness rays would burn my eyes out like campfire marshmallows.

name: chrissketch
text: Gossip travels around GOFight faster than a highschool cafeteria.

name: pyro_ike
text: Roast Beef is a Professional .

name: werthog42
text: Not the only son anymore... But you can't blame RB for not knowing.

name: foetus_punch
text: I want a "Wringer" and some whiskey. Seriously, a Big Dog would go down a treat.

name: ham_shoes
text: What I want to know is: What is a Tri-Tip?

name: foetus_punch
text: My dick.

name: selbencoirlo
text: A delicious piece of beef.

name: tommythebrat
text: The way the rumour of eating part of Martinez's face syncs up with his plastic surgery (out of embarassment, rather than have Ray nibble on him) is flat out beautiful.

name: wonelove
text:
"he's good people..."

I need to start saying that

name: woodenteeth
text: I think people often forget that these comics happened. So many comments these days that immediately judge without considering that there might be an arc up coming. Bit of patience Acheworld.

name: echidnaboy
text:
Absolutely. If this strip came out today half of Acheworld would be like "wtf that wasn't very funny Onstad has lost it" and the next day the same crowd would be all "oh yes this is awesome achewood is back on form!!!1"

Sometimes it makes sense to think of Achewood as not a comic strip but a comic book which happens to be published one page at a time.

name: chachibenji
text: Oh beef you so wacky all setting the color and tone of it all.

name: direhaggis
text: Hot dog chef has enough underarm action going on for buttering popcorn, if they served popcorn.

name: goatmasterflash
text: I used to enjoy buttered popcorn. This comment of yours may have saved my life just then, direhaggis.

name: ham_shoes
text: Yuck!

name: alzuna
text: Roast Beef is one crafty cat.

name: goatmasterflash
text: Rodney Leonard Stubbs' image seems to be getting hazier with each recollection. Either his image or my memory - definitely one of the two.

name: poodlelucy
text: onstad does hair better than anyone i have seen. he is extra good at the balding mullet.

name: locust_king
text: Beef's hardcore. The foodstand guy refers to him as multiple people.

name: king-jim
text: This whole arc gets cold 5's all the way through

name: afrothunder
text: I actually slapped my English teacher when she refused to acknowledge that the gossipy hot dog chef was an archetype.

name: dumbeast
text: That is one sketchy-looking snacks stand
